{"id":1185680983,"question_id":441,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1708857201,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1185680983/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n      int l=0;\n      int h=n-1;\n      while(l<=h){\n          int k=l+(h-l)/2;\n          int t=k*(k+1)/2;\n          if(t==n || t==0) return k;\n          else if (t>n) h=k-1;\n          else l=k+1;\n\n      }  \n      return h;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
